Articles.Content:
Sorry if this isn't the right place to post this, I searched through but wasn't sure....

So my problem is with a Rover mission which asks:

"Driver Rover (enter rover name) to Waypoint and conduct Science"

I did and it didn't allow me to pass the mission due to two constraints:

1. I apparently wasn't at the location (I was actually, bang on)

2. No wheels on my rover (I have Akita wheels on it)

 

Can't find if this mission is one from an add-on, I don't think so.

Is this a) a broken mission i.e. it doesn't realise I have arrived at the waypoint and b) requiring the stock set of wheels?

Any help would be appreciated.

2 hours ago, Spoonifer said:

Sorry if this isn't the right place to post this, I searched through but wasn't sure....

So my problem is with a Rover mission which asks:

"Driver Rover (enter rover name) to Waypoint and conduct Science"

I did and it didn't allow me to pass the mission due to two constraints:

1. I apparently wasn't at the location (I was actually, bang on)

2. No wheels on my rover (I have Akita wheels on it)

 

Can't find if this mission is one from an add-on, I don't think so.

Is this a) a broken mission i.e. it doesn't realise I have arrived at the waypoint and b) requiring the stock set of wheels?

Any help would be appreciated.

Could be any of the above but I'd say wheels,  you'll have to cheat this one.
